roleset.name: to chase and catch fly balls in baseball
roleset.note: SHAG-V NOTES: Frames file for 'shag' based on survey of sentences in the WSJ corpus. (from shag.01-v predicate notes)

example.name: shag-a-delic, baby!
example.text: In the outfield , Paul Blair , the Orioles ' eight-time Gold Glove winner , elegantly shags a fly .
example.arg: Paul Blair , the Orioles ' eight-time Gold Glove winner ,
